text: Varanamalyam is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Vijay P. Nair, starring Siddique and Shanthi Krishna in the lead roles. ==Cast== * Madhu as Thamburan * Siddique as Adv. R. B. Bharathan Varma * Shanthi Krishna as Prof. Vasundhara Thamburatti * Kunchan as Unnithan * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Shankara Pilla * Sudheesh as Vinod Kumar * Mala Aravindan as Prof. Mathayi * Geetha Vijayan as Prof. Sisily * Kumarakam Reghunath as Prof. Venu *Janardhanan as K. V. Thomas * Jose Pellissery as MLA *Kanakalatha as Vasanthi *C. I. Paul as CM *Bahadoor as Kunjunni *T. P. Madhavan as Gopalan Nair ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Varanamalyam
